channel.title: CVE Feed for hikvision -- DS-3WF0AC-2NT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for hikvision -- DS-3WF0AC-2NT

item.title: CVE-2022-28173|2024-08-03T05:48:37.550Z -- hikvision -- ds-3wf0ac-2nt
item.description: The web server of some Hikvision wireless bridge products have an access control vulnerability which can be used to obtain the admin permission. The attacker can exploit the vulnerability by sending crafted messages to the affected devices.
